Models¶

A logistic regression model to predict the probability of a soccer shot being a goal

runmodel.runmodel()[source]¶

This function includes:

  1. Split data into training and testing.
  2. Train the model using logistic regression.
  3. Output the summary result.
  4. Save the model result into pickle file.
preprocess.preprocss()[source]¶

This function includes:

  1. Read data from directory.
  2. Reduce event_type into 6 levels.
  3. Convert assist_method into “Yes” and “No”.
  4. Upsample the data.
app.model()[source]¶

Read values from inputs on the website and return the predicted result.

app.parser()[source]¶

Initialize the webpage
